answers.answer: Best of luck to you!!! I felt the same way when I was where you are! Around 36 weeks I got a little (very little lol) burst of energy and I'm 37+2 today! Hang in there, I've had a difficult pregnancy too. I thought it would be more enjoyable, but it's all worth it in the end! Just keep thinking about you little bundle of joy!!!

I feel ur pain! Im excatly the same extream pain all the time no sleep because of it i cant even comfort eat because iv gestational diabetes and bonus morning sickness is back with a bang. I feel like im practically living in the hospital.But at least u have a date known to have ur baby,aside from my est date i dont see an end :'(Im 33+5 aswell and in tears most days i just want this pregancy to be over. I want to feel like me again
I feel your pain, I'm 34 weeks and I am ready to call it quits! This pregnancy had been more difficult on my body than my 1st and I am a young momma ! :/ I can't wait til October comes
Omg me too!! I have 7 more days left and I can't take it anymore .. my first was so easy had him at 35 weeks , I'm just tired already

question: Any mama's in those last few weeks just feel like the cannot do this any longer? I am in severe constant pain. I can no longer dress myself, get in and out of bed, or sit up for more than a half hour at a time. I'm in and out of the hospital weekly, if not more frequently. I'm 33 & 5 and I'm burning out quickly. This has not been a happy or exciting pregnancy, and I'm just so sick of being in pain. The goal is to make it to 37 before induction but seeing as how I can't move on my own, those few weeks seem like months. Any advice on how to relax?
title: Giving up.
